snippet: Chancellor Dennis M. Walcott said a strike by New York City school bus drivers, which could affect as many as 152,000 public and private school students, was “irresponsible and disrespectful.”
abstract: New York City schools chancellor Dennis M Walcott says strike by city’s school bus drivers was all but inevitable and dismisses it as 'irresponsible and disrespectful' to students and parents; strike could affect as many as 152,000 public and private school students who rely on yellow bus service.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Dennis M. Walcott said a strike by New York City school bus drivers, which could affect as many as 152,000 public and private school students, was “irresponsible and disrespectful.”

headline.seo: New York School Bus Strike Is Expected
headline.main: City Officials Say School Bus Strike Would Be Irresponsible
headline.print_headline: City Officials Say School Bus Strike Would Be Irresponsible
